name: Speed Smelling (IFF)
description: Speed Smelling is a part of International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF), a global leader in the creation of flavors and fragrances. Speed Smelling is a specialized service that focuses on educational experiences regarding scent. It is designed to enhance the understanding of perfumery and fragrance branding among consumers, perfume professionals, and industry stakeholders. Through interactive sessions, Speed Smelling aims to demystify the art of scent creation, exploring different notes and compositions.

name: Speick
description: Speick is a German company renowned for its natural and organic personal care products, including a range of high-quality perfumes. Founded on the principles of sustainability and nature, Speick uses the Speick plant, a unique Alpine herb known for its soothing and healing properties. The company has a rich history since its inception in 1928, and it specializes in creating products that harmonize body and mind, with an emphasis on vegan formulations and environmentally friendly practices.

name: Speidel
description: Speidel is a perfume and fragrance company that specializes in crafting unique and high-quality scents. They focus on creating fragrances that combine traditional perfumery techniques with modern sensibilities, appealing to a wide range of customers. Founded with a passion for olfactory art, Speidel has developed a reputation for its innovative scents that reflect individuality and style.

name: Spektr
description: Spektr is a contemporary perfume brand known for its innovative approach to fragrance creation. The company distinguishes itself through a focus on high-quality ingredients, unique scent combinations, and artistic packaging. Established to bring a fresh perspective to the fragrance market, Spektr often collaborates with renowned perfumers and artists, creating a brand that values creativity and individuality in perfumery. The company's story revolves around a commitment to sustainability and the art of scent, inviting customers to explore a spectrum of olfactory experiences.

name: Speziali Fiorentini
description: Speziali Fiorentini is a historic Italian perfume company known for its artisan fragrances steeped in tradition and artistry. Founded in Florence, the company has a long-standing heritage of creating high-quality perfumes that capture the essence of Italian luxury. They specialize in crafting unique scents that reflect the rich cultural and botanical landscape of Italy, utilizing precious ingredients and artisanal techniques. The company's products often blend historical influences with modern aesthetics, making them a cherished choice among fragrance connoisseurs.

name: Spezierie Palazzo Vecchio

Founded to celebrate the rich heritage of Florentine perfume-making, the company combines traditional techniques with contemporary sensibilities. Their product line features a range of unique scents, inspired by the beauty and history of Tuscany, appealing to both local and international clientele. The brand emphasizes the use of natural ingredients and craftsmanship, ensuring each fragrance tells a story and embodies the essence of Italian artistry.
address: Via dei Cimatori, 9/r, 50122 Firenze FI, Italy

Stitch Perfumes specializes in high-quality, handcrafted fragrances using sustainable and ethically sourced ingredients, catering to those who seek distinctive and albeit luxurious olfactory experiences.

name: Stone Research Labs
description: Stone Research Labs is an innovative fragrance development company specializing in creating bespoke perfumes and olfactory experiences for brands and individuals. Founded by a team of experienced perfumers and scent enthusiasts, Stone Research Labs emphasizes research and development in the fragrance industry, utilizing cutting-edge technology and an extensive collection of raw materials to craft unique scents. Their focus is on quality, sustainability, and individuality, positioning themselves as a leader in bespoke fragrance solutions.

name: Stora Skuggan
description: Stora Skuggan is a Swedish perfume house that specializes in creating unique and artistic fragrances inspired by mythical landscapes and stories from nature. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers and artists, the company believes in the power of scent to evoke emotions and memories, creating perfumes that are not just fragrances but experiences. Their philosophy revolves around sustainability and artistic expression, combining high-quality ingredients sourced from nature with innovative perfumery techniques.

name: Stories by Eliza Grace
description: Stories by Eliza Grace is an indie perfume company that specializes in creating unique, artisanal fragrances inspired by stories and personal experiences. Founded by Eliza Grace, the brand emphasizes the importance of storytelling through scent, crafting perfumes that evoke emotions and memories. Each fragrance is designed to transport the wearer to a specific moment, reflecting a deep connection between scent and storytelling.

name: Stories Parfums
description: Stories Parfums is a niche fragrance company that specializes in creating unique and evocative perfumes inspired by storytelling and emotions. The brand focuses on crafting artisanal fragrances that reflect various narratives and experiences, blending art with perfumery to invite wearers into a world of imagination. Each fragrance is designed to evoke a specific story, allowing individuals to express their personality and moods through scent.

name: Storm
description: Storm is a UK-based lifestyle brand that offers a diverse range of fragrances. Known initially for its stylish watches and accessories, Storm has expanded into the fragrance market, providing a selection of unique and vibrant perfumes that cater to the modern consumer. The company combines contemporary design with quality ingredients, creating scents that reflect current trends and cater to a youthful demographic. Storm fragrances are often characterized by their bold packaging and eclectic fragrances that appeal to various tastes.

name: STR8
description: STR8 is a fragrance brand primarily targeted at young men, offering a range of fresh and energetic scents. The brand is known for its vibrant advertising campaigns and youthful image, aiming to connect with a dynamic audience. STR8's philosophy revolves around confidence and self-expression, and it positions itself as an affordable yet stylish option in the fragrance market. The brand has a diverse collection that includes deodorants, aftershaves, and colognes.

name: Strada Parfumerie
description: Strada Parfumerie is a niche perfume company known for its artisanal fragrance creations that often draw inspiration from various cultural elements and history. They focus on crafting unique scents that cater to a discerning clientele looking for exclusivity and quality. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients and often engages in storytelling through their fragrance lines, showcasing the essence of different locales and experiences.

name: Strange Invisible Perfumes
description: Strange Invisible Perfumes is a boutique perfume company specializing in the creation of artisanal fragrances that are natural and crafted using organic ingredients. Founded in 2000 by perfumer and founder Alexandra Balahoutis, the company emphasizes sustainability and eco-friendliness in its production processes. They are known for their unique, bold scent profiles that often draw inspiration from nature and diverse cultural themes. The brand places a strong emphasis on handcrafting their perfumes in small batches, offering a highly curated experience for fragrance enthusiasts.

name: Strangelove NYC
description: Strangelove NYC is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Founded by a duo passionate about unique scent experiences, Strangelove NYC draws inspiration from the vibrancy and diversity of New York City, utilizing rare and exquisite ingredients. Their offerings are known for their complex compositions and contemporary aesthetics, appealing to a discerning clientele that values craftsmanship in perfumery. The brand emphasizes sustainability and ethical sourcing in its fragrance creation process, making it stand out in the fragrance industry.

name: Strangers Parfumerie
description: Strangers Parfumerie is a niche fragrance house known for its artisanal and innovative approach to perfumery. Founded by an artist who draws inspiration from emotional landscapes and evocative experiences, the company specializes in creating unique and thought-provoking scents that tell stories and evoke memories. The brand emphasizes the use of high-quality raw materials and a meticulous craftsmanship process, aiming to provide a personal connection to the olfactory experience.

name: Straub Marbert Beauty Group
description: Straub Marbert Beauty Group is a renowned manufacturer and distributor of high-quality perfumes and beauty products, primarily focused on creating unique fragrances that cater to diverse consumer preferences. Established in the beauty industry for decades, the group has cultivated a strong reputation for quality and innovation by utilizing sophisticated fragrance formulations and sustainable practices. Their specialty lies in developing both private label and branded products that reflect contemporary trends while maintaining a commitment to excellence.

name: StrawberryNET
description: StrawberryNET is an online retailer specializing in beauty and fragrance products, offering a wide range of perfumes, skincare, and cosmetics from various brands at discounted prices. Founded in 1998, StrawberryNET began as a small beauty site in Hong Kong and has grown to become a global e-commerce platform, serving customers with authentic products delivered directly to their doorsteps. The company is known for its wide selection of niche and designer fragrances, catering to a diverse clientele with a focus on providing affordable luxury.

name: Strellson
description: Strellson is a Swiss fashion brand specializing in men's clothing and lifestyle products, including a range of fragrances. Founded in 1984, it is known for its modern designs that fuse classic elegance with contemporary style. The brand focuses on quality and functionality, appealing to sophisticated customers and emphasizing their unique identity through their perfume offerings. Strellson's fragrance line complements their clothing line, often aimed at a young, urban, and stylish male demographic.

name: Strenesse
description: Strenesse is a German fashion and lifestyle company known for its high-quality clothing and accessories, which includes a distinct line of fragrances. Established as a premium brand, Strenesse focuses on modern elegance and premium fabrics in its designs. The brand's foray into perfume complements its fashion lines, aiming to embody the same sophistication and chic lifestyle that their clothing represents. Strenesse perfumes are characterized by their refined scents and attention to detail in packaging and branding, appealing to a discerning clientele.

name: Students of Facultad de Bellas Artes
description: Students of Facultad de Bellas Artes is an innovative perfume collective formed by students of the Fine Arts Faculty, focusing on artisanal and creative fragrance designs. This student initiative emphasizes the fusion of artistic expression and olfactory exploration, showcasing unique scent compositions that reflect the diversity of the student body and their artistic visions. The project not only provides hands-on experience in perfume creation but also promotes an understanding of scent as a form of art.

name: Studio Break
description: Studio Break is a niche perfume company that focuses on creating unique, artistic fragrances inspired by various forms of modern and contemporary art. The brand aims to transcend traditional fragrance boundaries by infusing creativity and cultural narratives into their perfume collections, appealing to connoisseurs and those seeking distinctive scent experiences. Each fragrance tells a story, often infused with pieces of artistic expression and emotion, making them not just scents but a part of a broader artistic dialogue.

name: Stüssy
description: Stüssy is a globally recognized streetwear brand founded in the early 1980s by Shawn Stüssy. Initially starting as a surfboard business, Stüssy quickly evolved into a cultural icon of streetwear, bridging the gap between surfing, skateboarding, and high fashion. The brand is known for its unique graphics, casual wear, and subcultural influences, and it has a strong reputation in the urban lifestyle and fashion scene. Although primarily known for apparel, Stüssy has also ventured into fragrances as part of its lifestyle offerings, often reflecting the brand's distinctive aesthetics.

name: Style & Grace
description: Style & Grace is a perfume company that focuses on creating elegant and luxurious fragrances. They are known for their unique blends that often evoke feelings of sophistication and charm. Their story began with the aim to blend modernity with classic perfume-making techniques, targeting consumers who appreciate artisanal craftsmanship and high-quality ingredients. They specialize in developing scents that cater to a diverse audience, offering a range of products from body mists to eau de parfums.

name: Style Parfum
description: Style Parfum is a luxury fragrance company that focuses on tailoring unique scent experiences. Known for their artisanal approach, they blend high-quality natural ingredients with innovative techniques to create distinctive perfumes. Founded by fragrance enthusiasts, the company has made a name for itself by prioritizing personal stories and emotions behind each scent, allowing customers to have a more intimate connection with the fragrance they choose. Their product line includes both unisex and gender-specific fragrances that cater to diverse preferences.

name: Styles For Less
description: Styles For Less is a retail company that focuses on providing trendy apparel and accessories for young women, including clothing, shoes, and fragrances. The company aims to deliver stylish options at affordable prices, ensuring that customers can express their personal style without overspending. Founded with a commitment to offering the latest fashion trends in a budget-friendly manner, Styles For Less has built a reputation for catering to a diverse and fashion-conscious customer base.

name: Suave
description: Suave is a well-known personal care brand that primarily focuses on providing affordable toiletries, including fragrance products. Originally established as a hair care brand, Suave has expanded its offerings to include a range of products that cater to different beauty needs, including body sprays and perfumes. The company aims to deliver high-quality products at accessible prices, connecting with a broad consumer base. Suave is recognized for its commitment to value without compromising on the essence of effective beauty solutions.

name: Suavinex
description: Suavinex is a Spanish company specializing in the manufacture and distribution of baby products, including a range of fragrances designed for newborns and children. The company focuses on creating safe, gentle, and pleasant scents that cater to the sensitive skin of infants. Established with a commitment to quality and innovation, Suavinex has expanded its product line to include not just perfumes but also feeding bottles, pacifiers, and related accessories, becoming a trusted name among parents seeking reliable and stylish products.

name: Succès de Paris
description: Succès de Paris is a niche perfume company known for its high-quality fragrances that capture the essence of Parisian elegance and sophistication. Established as a homage to the rich history of the perfume industry in France, the brand focuses on unique scent profiles, often inspired by French culture and artistry. Its creations are sought after for their artisanal craftsmanship and the use of luxurious ingredients, appealing to those who appreciate the finer details of perfumery.

name: Sucesores B. Faig Gelant
description: Sucesores B. Faig Gelant is a perfumery company based in Spain that specializes in the production and distribution of high-quality fragrance products. Founded in 1940, the company has carved a niche in the perfume industry by creating a diverse range of fragrances that appeal to both international and local markets. They are known for their craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with modern innovation, thus establishing a reputation for quality and uniqueness in their offerings.

name: Suchel Fragancias
description: Suchel Fragancias is a perfume company known for crafting high-quality fragrances that cater to diverse consumer preferences. Founded in the early 1990s, the company has established itself as a leader in the fragrance industry in Latin America. Suchel Fragancias focuses on creating both innovative and classic scents, utilizing a mix of natural and synthetic ingredients to produce unique fragrances. They have a wide range of products, from personal fragrances to home scents, and are dedicated to sustainability and ethical sourcing in their production processes.

name: Sucreabeille
description: Sucreabeille is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating unique, artistic fragrances inspired by a wide array of themes, including fantasy, mythology, and sweet confections. Founded by a passionate perfume enthusiast, the brand focuses on crafting quality scents that evoke storytelling and imagination. The company's offerings are often characterized by playful, whimsical packaging and inventive scent compositions, appealing to fragrance lovers who seek something distinctive and personal. Sucreabeille has developed a loyal customer base through its commitment to creative artistry and small-batch production, thereby contributing to the niche perfume market.

name: Sue Devitt
description: Sue Devitt is a cosmetics and fragrance company founded by makeup artist Sue Devitt. The brand is renowned for its focus on utilizing unique ingredients and sophisticated packaging, catering to customers seeking quality products that enhance beauty in a holistic manner. The company offers a range of perfumes that reflect its commitment to craftsmanship and innovative scent profiles, drawing inspiration from Sue's diverse travels and experiences.
